name: radarr
tagline: A self-hosted movie manager that automates downloads and organization
description: Radarr is a self-hosted movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It monitors RSS feeds, searches for movies, and automatically downloads and renames content.

features.title: Automated Downloads
features.description: Monitor RSS feeds and automatically grab movies when they become available

features.title: Quality Profiles
features.description: Define preferred resolutions, codecs, and file sizes to download the right version

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Connect to Usenet and torrent indexers to search across multiple sources simultaneously

features.title: Calendar View
features.description: See upcoming releases and track when movies will be available for download

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Automatically rename and organize downloaded movies into a consistent folder structure

features.title: Data Import
features.description: Automatically add movies from IMDb lists, Trakt, or other sources to your collection
